pkmkdoc.description:
Installs prebuilt frothkit support folders and prepares cocotron tools for froth development.
Custom builds are still supported with this installer, simply checkout the latest sources from frothkit.googlecode.com and build the kit.
FrothSDK Root /Developer/FrothSDK
Cocotron Root /Developer/Cocotron
With this installer you have the option of automatically downloading and installing Cocotron from http://cocotron.googlecode.com for deploying web applications to amazon ec2/linux
If you already have a Cocotron installation, then this installer will not reinstall it.
You can use the public froth amazon ec2 instances to create a local platform interface file for froth dependancies.

choice.title: Install Cocotron and Tools
choice.tooltip: Installs cocotron's foundation frameworks and tools if not already installed
choice.description:
Select this option to install prebuilt cocotron foundation frameworks for linux as well as cocotron gcc tools.
If you already of an installation of cocotron, this will not reinstall the tools It will determine if you have a linux foundation build at /Developer/Cocotron/1.0/Linux/i386/
